PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11062017-08-28,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Terminating the Assignment of the Honourable Carla Qualtrough, Assigning the Honourable Kent Hehr to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development and Assigning the Honourable Jane Philpott to Assist the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development
PrecisOrder (1) terminating the assignment of the Honourable Carla Qualtrough, made by Order in Council P.C. 2015-1227 of November 4, 2015; (2) assigning the Honourable Kent Hehr, a minister of State styled Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage and the Minister of Employment and Social Development; and (3) assigning the Honourable Jane Philpott, a minister of State styled Minister of Indigenous Services, to assist the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2017-0044 Publication Date: 2017-09-20
AttachmentsAttachment
